Description.Text: Facilities The range of services and facilities offered by the hotel ensures that travellers enjoy a comfortable stay. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning and a bathroom. A safe and a minibar are also available. Additional features include a microwave and a tea/coffee station. Other features include internet access, a telephone, a TV and WiFi. Slippers are laid out in each of the rooms. The bathrooms have a shower and a bathtub. Bathrobes can also be found in each of the bathrooms. Sports/Entertainment A range of sport and leisure opportunities ensure an interesting stay. A range of options are available, including a gym, a spa and massage treatments. Fun and entertainment are offered by a casino.
